Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAi gives real time draft work feedback. I drive it to create content, edit and re-work that content, then feed my draft back into AI for feedback and for further refinement. This cycle(s) now forms part of my workflow for nearly all study and work tasks. This is both in the context of LLMs and image based GenAI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: teacher feedback has tended to be more summative
